name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly in compliance-driven environments. Proficient in modern programming languages including **Go**, **Rust**, and **C++**, with a strong foundation in **blockchain** technologies and frameworks such as **Solidity** and **Yul**. Demonstrates expertise in implementing **CI/CD** practices and creating efficient release pipelines, ensuring robust observability and environment orchestration.
Skilled in algorithms and data structures, focusing on performance optimization and cryptography, including work with Merkle trees. Additionally, experienced in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**, with hands-on knowledge of **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven real-world application of AI/ML in healthcare and financial sectors, handling predictive analytics and automation. Strong track record in deploying cloud-based solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing microservices and event-driven architectures.
